title: Peptide dendrimers transfecting CRISPR/Cas9 plasmid DNA: optimization and mechanism
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript

Gene editing by CRISPR/Cas9 offers great therapeutic opportunities but requires delivering large plasmid DNA (pDNA) into cells, a task for which transfection reagents are better suited than viral vectors. Here...
